name: hex
doc:
function FASTCALL hex(num as ULong) as String

Parameters:
    num : 32 bit unsigned integer number

Returns:
	4 chars str containing the HEX string representation

name: hex16
doc:
function hex16(n as UInteger) as String

16 bit version - Returns hex string representation

name: hex8
doc:
Function hex8 (n as UByte) as String

8 bit version - Returns hex string representation
